entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except rain at times heavy over northern sections early this evening. Fog patches. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
